references.paper_title: Real-time photorealistic dynamic scene representation and rendering with 4d gaussian splatting
references.reason: This is the foundation for the work in this paper as it builds upon 4D Gaussian Splatting (4DGS) directly, and 4DGS is cited multiple times in the paper.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper is another important baseline, as 4DGS incorporates concepts from 3D Gaussian Splatting, and 3DGS is mentioned multiple times throughout the paper.

references.paper_title: Neural 3d video synthesis from multi-view video
references.reason: This paper is important because the Neural 3D Video Dataset (N3V), which is used to evaluate the method in the paper, is introduced in this paper.

references.paper_title: D-nerf: Neural radiance fields for dynamic scenes
references.reason: This paper is important because the D-NeRF Dataset, which is used to evaluate the method in the paper, is introduced in this paper.

references.paper_title: 4d gaussian splatting for real-time dynamic scene rendering
references.reason: This paper serves as an alternative baseline for comparison with 4DGS-1K, specifically the approach of 4D Gaussian Splatting, and it is often used as a reference point for evaluating improvements in the field.
